subproject.description: The aim of the project, envisioned as a component of Cabo Verde’s Refrigerant Management Plan (RMP) that is to be presented at the 43rd Meeting of the Executive Committee of the Multilateral Fund, is to supply equipment, including Recovery and Recycling (R&R) facilities, for the refrigeration and MAC servicing sub-sectors to assure correct servicing practices. 1 Training Workshop for the refrigeration and mobile air-conditioning (MAC) service sectors will be held to familiarise service technicians with the RMP and to train them in the correct employment of the equipment and the recovery and recycling of refrigerants.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: CBI/REF/44/TAS/08-Technical As
